title: Did Trump Say COVID-19 Deaths Wouldn’t Hurt Anyone as Much as Himself?
subtitle: During an ABC News interview, the president spoke about reopening the U.S. and what he'd say to those who lost loved ones to the coronavirus disease.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: When U.S. President Donald Trump was asked what he'd say to people who lost family members to COVID-19, he replied, "I would say this didn't hurt anyone as much as it hurt me."
